```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(eda)
library(purrr)
library(vlbuildr)
library(vegawidget)
library(widgetframe)
```

```{r get_data}
load(params$analysis_results)
```


## Categorical variables

```{r plot_cat}
plt <- plot_all_analysis_results_vl(factor_results)
vegawidget(plt)
```

## Numerical variables

```{r plot_num}
plt <- plot_all_analysis_results_vl(numeric_results)
vegawidget(plt)
```
